Output Modules.​PIT_MAIL.​PIT_MAIL_PKG Body

Implements PIT_MAIL output module methods

Juergen Sieben, ConDeS GmbH

Package Constants
Parameter Constants
C_PARAM_GROUP

Parameter group of PIT

C_MODULE_NAME

Parameter name prefix for the PIT_MAIL parameters

C_FIRE_THRESHOLD

Parameter name for the generic fire threshold

C_FROM

Parameter name for the APEX email sender address

C_TO

Parameter name for the APEX email recipient list

C_SUBJECT

Parameter name for the email subject entry

C_LIVE_THRESHOLD

Parameter name for the threshold of mails to be sent immediately

C_DAILY_THRESHOLD

Parameter name for the threshold of mails to be sent once a day

C_PURGE_PERIOD

Parameter name for the default purge period

Privarte Helper
prepare_message
function prepare_message(
p_message in message_type,
p_amount in number default null,
p_first_date in date default null,
p_last_date in date default null
)
return clob

Method to convert a MESSAGE_TYPE.message into a string. Is used to cast a message text into a CLOB text instance

Parameters
p_message
in message_type

MESSAGE_TYPE instance

p_amount
in number

Optional amount of messages of the same type within the report time frame

p_first_date
in date

Optional first time the message was raised

p_last_date
in date

Optional last time the message was raised

Returns

String with a formatted message

p_attachment

send_schedule
procedure send_schedule(
p_threshold in number
)

Method to send messages as a report. This method is called from various SEND_<Name of the Schedule> methods defined in this package.

If you want to create a new schedule, thew following tasks need to be done:

  • Create a schedule and assign the method name as its action (or add this action to an existing schedule)

  • Define a threshold that defines which messages are to be sent (All messages lower or equal this threshold are sent if they are not processed yet)

  • Create a parameter to hold this threshold and read it in the initialize method

Parameter
p_threshold
in number

Severity that defines which messages are being sent

initialize
procedure initialize

Initialization method. Is called from <INITIALIE_MODULE> to read parameter values
